function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints during lockdown, particularly due to birds and construction/building works","Impact":"Increased annoyance and irritation for people working from home or spending more time outdoors","Mitigation":"Implement noise reduction measures in construction sites and urban areas, educate the public about nature sounds and their benefits","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, noise barriers, and acoustic design in urban planning","People":"People working from home, residents in urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners, construction companies, and local government"},{"Description":"Decrease in outdoor noise complaints for transport and voice/instrument sources during lockdown","Impact":"Potential decrease in awareness of transport noise pollution and impact on public health","Mitigation":"Encourage public awareness campaigns on transport noise pollution and its health effects, advocate for sustainable transport solutions","Technologies":"Noise monitoring devices, public health education campaigns, sustainable transportation options","People":"General public, public health organizations, advocates for sustainable transport","Owner":"Environmental agencies, public health organizations, and advocates for sustainable transport"}]}
